title: Your local council
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board, John Martin-Jones and Bern Gandy
brief_description: Reviews the work of local councils in Australia in providing essential services and amenities in the community. Outlines the services provided by local government. Includes interesting scenes of city and country life and times of the early 1950’s in Eastern Australia.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian National Film Board, John Martin-Jones and Bern Gandy
